title: Aside A is twice as good a workman as B and therefore able to finish a job in 28 days less than B working together, they can do it in how many days together? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let this Aside A take x days to finish the job B takes 2x days to finish the job Which means that in one day, Aside A finishes 1/x th part of the work and B finishes 1/2xpart of the work Working together in one day they finish 1/x + 1/(2x)th part of job or 1/(2x -28) Solving, x =21 Aside A takes 21 days B takes 42 days Together they take 14 days
Let A take x days B takes 2x days 2x-x =28 x =28 A =28 days B = 56 days Together in 1 day =1/28+1/56 = 3/56 of the work Together they will finish the work in 56/3 OR 18.67 days ANSWER
